title: Strange Perceptions
description: Taking a popular urban legend and putting a modern day twist on it, author Anthony Avina showcases his talent for suspense and horror with a brand new tale!Lily Roberts was 24 year's old when she met evil for the first time. On the eve of her birthday, Lily, known to her viewers as Lily On Demand, is enjoying a fun evening in Los Angeles. Having garnered fame as a popular internet personalty and aspiring writer, Lily has found a path that allows her voice to be heard.However, her voice may have attracted the wrong kind of attention. A pleasant drive home soon becomes a nightmare, and Lily must fight to survive from a brutal and relentless attacker. In her fight for survival, Lily will learn that looks can be deceiving, and people, much like life, is a matter of...Strange Perceptions!
author: Anthony Avina
